Provides details about a Lake Formation resource.

## Example Usage

{{< chooser language "typescript,python,go,csharp" / >}}

{{% example csharp %}}
```csharp
using Pulumi;
using Aws = Pulumi.Aws;

class MyStack : Stack
{
    public MyStack()
    {
        var example = Output.Create(Aws.LakeFormation.GetResource.InvokeAsync(new Aws.LakeFormation.GetResourceArgs
        {
            Arn = "arn:aws:s3:::tf-acc-test-9151654063908211878",
        }));
    }

}
```

{{% /example %}}

{{% example go %}}
```go
package main

import (
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi-aws/sdk/v3/go/aws/lakeformation"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v2/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		_, err := lakeformation.LookupResource(ctx, &lakeformation.LookupResourceArgs{
			Arn: "arn:aws:s3:::tf-acc-test-9151654063908211878",
		}, nil)
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}
```
